settings.heading: Looking great & feeling confident are luxuries that should be accessible to everyone

settings.text:
Hello!

I'm honored to welcome you to Adoro!

As you navigate our website, you'll learn about the many aspect that make up the Adoro
vision, but let me give you a quick intro here. At Adoro, we're focused on the idea of genuine design and classic fashion. It is a concept that goes beyond the quick trends and fads of fast fashion and really brings into the game a framework that enables and supports ethically made, long lasting pieces that are timeless in artistry and quality.

The word "Adoro" stems from the Italian expression of liking or loving something. At the end of the day, that's what we aim to become for our customers. An avenue to help you become the best version of yourself, one that you value and love! I'm elated that you've chosen Adoro as your choice as you embark on this fashion journey, and we hope you find the same joy from these articles as we've had in crafting them for you.
Browse our ever growing catalogue and order any products you like. We focus on timeless and versatile designs. There will always be a perfect shoe for you.
We receive your order and craft it with the utmost care. We send you updates about the production process. You’ll get years of quality and see how your shoes come to life.
Once your products are ready they are shipped straight to your door. We bypass middlemen and retail stores. Saving money and getting high quality is that simple.

settings.qote_txt:
Hello!

I'm honored to welcome you to Adoro! As you navigate our website, you'll learn about the many aspect that make up the Adoro vision, but let me give you a quick intro here.

At Adoro, we're focused on the idea of genuine design and classic fashion. It is a concept that goes beyond the quick trends and fads of fast fashion and really brings into the game a framework that enables and supports ethically made, long lasting pieces that are timeless in artistry and quality.

The word "Adoro" stems from the Italian expression of liking or loving something. At the end of the day, that's what we aim to become for our customers. An avenue to help you become the best version of yourself, one that you value and love!

I'm elated that you've chosen Adoro as your choice as you embark on this fashion journey, and we hope you find the same joy from these articles as we've had in crafting them for you.

settings.text: We believe we can all come out on top. From the environment we live in, to the craftspeople we employ, to you - our great customers.

settings.heading: Good for you
settings.caption: LONG-TERM VALUE
settings.text: Well-built products last for years, not seasons. They get even better with time and can be repaired if need be. You’ll save money and reduce waste.
settings.text_2: You receive great value and the peace of mind of knowing your products were handcrafted under ethical and responsible conditions.
settings.text_3: Without the risk of having unsold inventory we can focus on offering you more design options. You’ll always find the product you’re looking for.

settings.heading: Good for the planet
settings.caption: SMART CONSUMPTION
settings.text: A made-to-order system minimizes impulse buying. It encourages thoughtful consumption and helps create fewer but better made things.
settings.text_2: Our supply is perfectly aligned to your demand.There’s never unsold inventory and resources are used only as they’re needed.
settings.text_3: Every product we put out into the world has an owner already. Each product we craft is the fulfillment of an actual order.

settings.text: You deserve the best. We’ll never cut corners on quality or business ethics. To achieve unrivaled value we follow three simple principles:

settings.title: DIRECT MANUFACTURING
settings.text: We source our raw materials and craft the products directly. You get wholesale prices straight from the source.

settings.title: MADE TO ORDER
settings.text: By crafting the products to order we reduce costs and free up cash flow. This allows us to operate with modest margins.

settings.title: ONLINE ONLY
settings.text: We only sell direct online. There’s no middlemen and no need for high markups to cover distribution costs.

We promise to offer you a smarter way to shop. A way that gives you the highest quality at the lowest price, while making a positive impact on the world. It’s simple, and may even sound mundane, but it’s what drives us.

Even if your order is already in production, you can cancel it for a full refund. Also, with each run we produce a small reserve of products to facilitate quick size exchanges. Shipping, returns and exchanges are free anywhere in the contiguous US.

Above all, we’re passionate about crafting footwear. This led us to spend years refining our products, processes and materials. Over 5,000 five-star reviews are a testament of our commitment to giving you the highest quality for the price.

settings.heading: CAN I EXCHANGE OR RETURN MY PURCHASE?
settings.row_content: Yes! You can return or exchange your unworn items for free anywhere in the contiguous US within 60-days of receipt. If the size isn’t right, we can process an exchange quickly. With each run we produce a small reserve of products for this purpose.

settings.heading: WHERE ARE THE PRODUCTS MADE?
settings.row_content: All of our products are crafted in Bogotá, Colombia under ethical and fair working conditions.

settings.heading: WHERE DO YOU SOURCE YOUR MATERIALS FROM?
settings.row_content: Our full-grain calfskin leather comes from Grupo Mastrotto, a tannery based in Arzignano, Italy. They are amongst the most well-respected tanneries in the world. This leather wears extremely well, looks amazing and will conform to the shape of your feet over time.

settings.heading: HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?
settings.row_content: Shipping is free within the contiguous US for delivery, returns and exchanges.
